messageValues.message: You are a helpful assistant, your job is to generate a recap from the provided meeting transcript, dont start with "Of couse", "here is the reca" or any sort of things, straight to the point.|NOTES: Use rich text no mardown

When Executed by Another Workflow.transcript: *   "Next, we will go ahead and add another HTTP request that fetch the transcription of the entire meeting. So it will be the same." (0:00 - 0:16) - Speaker: portfolio otman *   "Change name to fetch the meeting strong scripts. Add description." (0:32 - 0:41) - Speaker: portfolio otman *   "Add description. Change the method to get a request." (0:36 - 0:46) - Speaker: portfolio otman *   "Add description. Change the method to get a request." (0:40 - 0:47) - Speaker: portfolio otman *   "And for the URL, it will be the same as delete." (0:46 - 0:57) - Speaker: portfolio otman *   "And just make sure you disable this on the body." (0:57 - 1:10) - Speaker: portfolio otman *   "So let's go ahead and execute it." (1:10 - 1:22) - Speaker: portfolio otman *   "So let's go ahead and execute it." (1:20 - 1:22) - Speaker: portfolio otman *   "So I will say get the meeting transcribed, give it down." (1:44 - 1:46) - Speaker: portfolio otman
